c74object.name: cage.scissors
c74object.digest: Split a roll according to a grid.
c74object.description: cage.scissors accepts a roll and two lists of split points, respectively horizontal (voice-wise) and vertical (temporal), defining a grid. It returns a matrix of rolls, each containing a section of the original roll as defined by the split grid.

objarg.name: voices
objarg.description: The first optional argument is a wrapped list setting the initial voice numbers acting as horizontal split points.

objarg.name: times
objarg.description: The second optional argument is a wrapped list setting the initial time split points.

c74object.discussion: cage.scissors is conceived to work in conjunction with cage.glue.
